text: GQ Cover Story Kylie Jenner and Travis Scott on Love, Making It Work, and the Kardashian Curse She ’ s a billionaire business mogul. He ’ s the most electric rapper in the game. How did they come together? How do they make it work? And can they survive the Kardashian Curse? Mark Anthony Green sits down with the world ’ s most powerhouse power couple. It's Kylie, from the jump, who controls the tempo. The youngest Jenner and her well - oiled glam squad bounce around Milk Studios, in Hollywood, with supreme purpose. Her half - male, half - female contingent is like Ocean's Eleven, except with more crop tops and lip fillers. And instead of a case full of phony casino chips, there's just a
